Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily life. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $150. Considering the value it brings, I'm extending you an exclusive offer to purchase it for $200. This is an opportunity to own a high-quality product at a competitive price. Please let me know if you're interested in this special offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
